tool_description: The Title Generator is a tool that generates creative and engaging titles for a given topic or theme. It uses natural language processing and machine learning algorithms to analyze and understand the content, and then generates a list of potential titles that are relevant, attention-grabbing, and search engine optimized. The goal of the project is to help users, especially content creators, to come up with catchy titles for their articles, blog posts, videos, and other forms of content. The t...
name: Title Generator
title: Title Generator

api_list.name: Generate Title
api_list.description: Generates a title for the given passage
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://title-generator2.p.rapidapi.com/title"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "title-generator2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://title-generator2.p.rapidapi.com/title"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "title-generator2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
